def_cn: (组织、运动的)追随者,跟风者
def_en: If you describe someone as a camp follower, you mean that they do not officially belong to a particular group or movement but support it for their own advantage.

def_cn: (尤指随军的)士兵家属,提供随军服务的人;跟随者
def_en: Camp followers are people who travel with an army or other group, especially members of soldiers' families, or people who supply goods and services to the army.
